original: log pa de ni gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log pa de ni gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that non-existence is one only.

original: 'o na ci ltar tha dad snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar tha dad snyam na /
translated: But how can it be different?

original: 'on kyang sgra ma yin pa la sogs pa ldog pa'i mtshams gang las ldog pa ste tha dad pa las ldog pa rnams tha dad @148b pa yin no zhes 'brel te //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgra ma yin pa la sogs pa ldog pa'i mtshams gang las ldog pa ste tha dad pa las ldog pa rnams tha dad @148b pa yin no zhes 'brel te //
translated: However, the differences of the exclusions of non-sound, etc. are different from the differences of the exclusions of sound, etc.

original: thun mong ni byas pa nyid de /
analyzed: thun mong ni byas pa nyid de /
translated: The common is the quality of being produced,

original: sgra dang sgra ma yin pa gnyi ga la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dang sgra ma yin pa gnyi ga la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists in both sound and non-sound.

original: thun mong ma yin pa ni sgra nyid de sgra'i bsal ba kho na la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa ni sgra nyid de sgra'i bsal ba kho na la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The uncommon is sound itself, because it exists only in the exclusion of sound.

original: yang na thun mong ba ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams yin la /
analyzed: yang na thun mong ba ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams yin la /
translated: Or, the common is the parts such as form and sound,

original: thun mong ma yin pa ni bum pa la sogs pa'i yan lag can no //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa ni bum pa la sogs pa'i yan lag can no //
translated: and the uncommon is the whole such as the pot.

original: de lta zhes bya ba ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: de lta zhes bya ba ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i tha dad pa'o //
translated: Thus means the difference between common and uncommon.

original: dngos po'i rkyen zhes bya ba ni sgra nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po'i rkyen zhes bya ba ni sgra nyid do //
translated: The condition of an entity is sound.

original: gzhan gyi ltar na ni dngos po'i rkyen don dam pa pa'i tha dad pas 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ltar na ni dngos po'i rkyen don dam pa pa'i tha dad pas 'jug pa yin la /
translated: According to the other schools, the condition of an entity is the ultimate difference.

original: sangs rgyas pa'i ltar na ni log pa'i tha dad par brtags pas yin no //🔽'dir ni gnyi ga ltar yang tha dad pa mi srid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa'i ltar na ni log pa'i tha dad par brtags pas yin no // 'dir ni gnyi ga ltar yang tha dad pa mi srid do //
translated: According to the Buddhists, it is the imagined difference.🔽Here, neither is possible.

original: 'gyur na yang zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa rnam pa gnyis med bzhin du'o //
analyzed: 'gyur na yang zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa rnam pa gnyis med bzhin du'o //
translated: Even if it were possible, it would be like the nonexistence of the two kinds of difference.

original: dogs pa ni dngos po'i rkyen zhes bya ba'o //🔽phan tshun brten pa nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: dogs pa ni dngos po'i rkyen zhes bya ba'o // phan tshun brten pa nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: The doubt is about the condition of an entity.

original: drug pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: drug pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The mutual dependence is expressed in the line “The sixth is the cause of the first.”

original: don ni sgra'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: don ni sgra'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning is that the object is not the reason for the word.

original: don mthong pa na ni brda las ni rjod par byed pa'i sgra yin no //
analyzed: don mthong pa na ni brda las ni rjod par byed pa'i sgra yin no //
translated: When the object is seen, the word is expressed by the convention.

original: don mthong ba med na ni brda med pa'i phyir sgra rjod byed ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don mthong ba med na ni brda med pa'i phyir sgra rjod byed ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object is not seen, there is no convention, and the word is not an expression.

original: des na 'di'i rjod par byed pa ni don gyi rgyu mtshan can yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di'i rjod par byed pa ni don gyi rgyu mtshan can yin no //
translated: Therefore, its expression is the reason for the object.

original: dogs pa ni don de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa ni don de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The doubt is about the object.

original: de lta bur gyur pa nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: Suchness is the nature of things.🔽

original: sgra las rtogs par 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: sgra las rtogs par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: “In this way” means that it is understood from the words.

original: gang zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: “What” means the object of expression.

original: tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba ni blang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba ni blang bar bya ba'o //
translated: “It is a means of valid knowledge” means that it is to be accepted.

original: de lta ma yin na sgras brjod par bya ba gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ci ltar de la tshad ma 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na sgras brjod par bya ba gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ci ltar de la tshad ma 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: Otherwise, since the object of expression by words is an object of knowledge, how could a means of valid knowledge engage it?

original: sgra gzhan gyis zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgras so //
analyzed: sgra gzhan gyis zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgras so //
translated: “By another word” means by the word “only.”

original: lan ni de lta na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de lta na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “In that case . . .”

original: sgra du ma las don du ma nyid yin na shing dang rkang 'thung la sogs pa du mas don du mar 'gyur bas rnam grangs su mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra du ma las don du ma nyid yin na shing dang rkang 'thung la sogs pa du mas don du mar 'gyur bas rnam grangs su mi 'gyur te /
translated: If many words have many meanings, then since many trees, palms, and so on would have many meanings, they would not be synonyms,

original: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin no //
translated: like the words pot, cloth, and so on.

original: gang gi phyir log pa tha dad pas ldog pa tha dad pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir log pa tha dad pas ldog pa tha dad pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Because the difference in the opposite is not the difference in the negation,

original: 'on kyang ldog mtshams tha dad pa las yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang ldog mtshams tha dad pa las yin la /
translated: but rather the difference in the boundary of the opposite.

original: 'dir ni ldog mtshams kyang tha dad pa med pa de'i phyir sgra ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni ldog mtshams kyang tha dad pa med pa de'i phyir sgra ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
translated: Here, the point of division is not different. Therefore, the words “sound” and so on are easy to understand.

original: 'dis ni tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ma grub par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ma grub par brjod pa yin no //
translated: By this, he states that the reason is not established because of the absence of difference.

original: da ni dam bca' ba sbyar ba'i dus nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir zlos pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da ni dam bca' ba sbyar ba'i dus nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir zlos pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that it is redundant because it is understood at the time of the statement of the thesis, he says,

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Moreover,”

original: sgru  zhes bya ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sgra'i mnyan pa nyid las so //
analyzed: sgru  zhes bya ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sgra'i mnyan pa nyid las so //
translated: “by the word itself” means by the word “sound.”

original: yang sgra nyid brjod pas ci bya /
analyzed: yang sgra nyid brjod pas ci bya /
translated: What is the use of stating the word “sound” again?

original: dogs pa ni yang brjod pa ni zhes bya ba ste /🔽chos sgra nyid gtsor @149a * //
analyzed: dogs pa ni yang brjod pa ni zhes bya ba ste / chos sgra nyid gtsor @149a * //
translated: The doubt is, “What is the use of stating it again?”

original: bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: The meaning is that the word “sound” is primary.

original: gtsor bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gtsor bya ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not primary.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why? Because it is fruitless.

original: 'on te de gtsor byas pa la 'bras bu go bar byed pa nyid yin pa yod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de gtsor byas pa la 'bras bu go bar byed pa nyid yin pa yod do zhe na /
translated: But if it is understood that the result is the statement itself when it is made primary,

original: chos can zhas smos so //
analyzed: chos can zhas smos so //
translated: he says, “the subject.”

original: byas pas zhes bya ba chos can gyi khyad par dngos po'i rkyen dang bral ba 'dis kyang mi rtag pa nyid rtogs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: byas pas zhes bya ba chos can gyi khyad par dngos po'i rkyen dang bral ba 'dis kyang mi rtag pa nyid rtogs pa kho na'o //
translated: “Because of being produced” is a specific property of the subject, and this also is the reason for understanding impermanence.

original: 'on te yang ci ltar sgron me'i chos gsal bar byed pa nyid rang rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du sgra'i nyid kyang rang mi rtag pa nyid du go bar byed pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te yang ci ltar sgron me'i chos gsal bar byed pa nyid rang rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du sgra'i nyid kyang rang mi rtag pa nyid du go bar byed pa yin no snyam na /
translated: But if one thinks that just as the property of the lamp, which is the cause of the understanding of itself, is illumination, in the same way, the property of sound, which is the cause of the understanding of itself, is impermanence,

original: mar me'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: mar me'i zhes smos so //
translated: then the response is “The lamp . . .”

original: mar me'i dpe'i dbang gis chos can chos kyis go bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: mar me'i dpe'i dbang gis chos can chos kyis go bar byed pa yin na /
translated: If the property of the subject is understood by the power of the example of the lamp,

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i me yang chos can de la gnas pa'i chos kyis shes par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i me yang chos can de la gnas pa'i chos kyis shes par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: then the hidden fire would be understood by the property that resides in that subject,

original: mar me bzhin du 'brel pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mar me bzhin du 'brel pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because, like the lamp, it would not depend on a relation.

original: des na ri 'di ni me dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: des na ri 'di ni me dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this mountain has fire,🔽because it has smoke, and this mountain has fire because it has smoke, and this mountain has fire because it has smoke.

original: ri yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yang sgrub byed yin pas du ba brjod pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ri yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yang sgrub byed yin pas du ba brjod pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the statement of the smoke would be pointless.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni tha snyad 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni tha snyad 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la ;
translated: Inference is not a transformation of convention.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i rtags so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i rtags so //
translated: The reason is smoke, etc., of inference.

original: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags gzhan brjod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags gzhan brjod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not said that another reason such as smoke, etc., is the reason.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu med pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu med pas na'o //
translated: Therefore means because of the absence of effect.

original: sngar brjod pa'i mjug sdud pa ni tha dad pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar brjod pa'i mjug sdud pa ni tha dad pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The summary of what was said previously is different.

original: dper na rtsol byung nyid kyi phyir zhes rtsol ba las byung ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin nyid chos can yin la /
analyzed: dper na rtsol byung nyid kyi phyir zhes rtsol ba las byung ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin nyid chos can yin la /
translated: For example, because of being produced by effort, the nature of sound that is produced by effort is the subject.🔽The commonality of sound, pot, etc., is the reason.

original: sgra dang bum pa la sogs pa'i thun mong ba ni rtags yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra dang bum pa la sogs pa'i thun mong ba ni rtags yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'brel ba'o //
translated: Because of is a conjunction.

original: ci'i phyir ma grub pa nyid ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma grub pa nyid ma yin snyam na /
translated: Why is it not unestablished?

original: sgra la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said residing in sound.

original: tha dad pa ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad pa ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it different?

original: sgra la gnas pa'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sgra la gnas pa'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said residing in sound.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba las gzhan las ni bum pa la sogs pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba las gzhan las ni bum pa la sogs pa las kyang ngo //
translated: from other than that which is produced by effort, from a pot, etc.

original: de las gzhan bum pa la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: de las gzhan bum pa la sogs pa las so //
translated: from other than that, from a pot, etc.

original: 'o na gang las tha dad snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na gang las tha dad snyam na /
translated: Well, then, from what is it different?

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Nevertheless,

original: glog la sogs pa kho na las so //🔽de ltar na re zhig / rtsol ba las byung ba'i sgra ni mi rtag ste rtsol ba las byung ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di la /
analyzed: glog la sogs pa kho na las so // de ltar na re zhig / rtsol ba las byung ba'i sgra ni mi rtag ste rtsol ba las byung ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di la /
translated: from lightning, etc.

original: chos can dang sgrub par byed pa rjod pa'i sgra dag rnam grangs ma yin par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chos can dang sgrub par byed pa rjod pa'i sgra dag rnam grangs ma yin par bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, in the syllogism, “The sound of effort is impermanent because it is produced by effort,” the words expressing the subject and the proof are shown to be synonymous.

original: 'di 'dra ba'i rnam grangs ma yin pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i rnam grangs ma yin pa nyid ni /
translated: This kind of non-synonymy

original: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di la med pa des na ma grub par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di la med pa des na ma grub par brjod pa yin no //
translated: does not exist in the case of “because it is sound.” Therefore, it is said to be unestablished.

original: des na zhes bya ba 'di ldog pa'i tha dad pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba 'di ldog pa'i tha dad pas so //
translated: “Therefore” is because of the difference in the negation.

original: de dang de @149b ma yin pa las zhes bya ba sgra dang sgra ma yin pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de dang de @149b ma yin pa las zhes bya ba sgra dang sgra ma yin pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: “From that and from that which is not that” refers to sound and non-sound.

original: de ltar gyur na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that if that were so, the error of non-pervasion would ensue,

original: 'o na zhes smras te /
analyzed: 'o na zhes smras te /
translated: then it is said, “Well then.”

original: rtsol ba las byung ba bzhin du khyab pa nyid med pa'i phyir sgra nyid la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon kho na yod par 'gyur gyi ma grub par ni mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba bzhin du khyab pa nyid med pa'i phyir sgra nyid la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon kho na yod par 'gyur gyi ma grub par ni mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since there is no pervasion like that which arises from effort, the error of non-pervasion would only exist in sound itself, but it would not be unestablished.

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: This is stated:

original: des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore.”

original: ci ltar ma grub pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar ma grub pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If you think that the error of non-establishment would not ensue,

original: ma grub pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is said, “Even if it is unestablished.”

original: grub pa'i mtha'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of the conclusion is this:

original: nyes pa gnyis yod kyang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas ma grub pa nyid du brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyes pa gnyis yod kyang ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas ma grub pa nyid du brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though two errors exist, it is said to be unestablished because of the exclusion of non-connection.

original: gal te nyes pa gnyis yod na /
analyzed: gal te nyes pa gnyis yod na /
translated: If two errors exist,

original: de'i tshe gnyi ga yang brjod do cog snyam na /
analyzed: de'i tshe gnyi ga yang brjod do cog snyam na /
translated: then you might think that both should be stated.

original: des zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “By that” is stated.

original: phyogs kyi chos med par ni gtan tshigs la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos med par ni gtan tshigs la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the reason is faulty in that it does not pervade the property of the position,

original: med pa nyid kyis the tshom skyed par mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni gtan tshigs yod na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa nyid kyis the tshom skyed par mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni gtan tshigs yod na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because nonexistence does not generate doubt.

original: de rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa bzlog pas khyab pa dang / sogs pa'i sgras thun mong ma yin pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni gtan tshigs rjes su 'gro ba med pa bzlog pas khyab pa dang / sogs pa'i sgras thun mong ma yin pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word “etc.” in “nonpervasion, etc.” includes the absence of the uncommon reason.

original: de ni rjes su 'gro ba la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rjes su 'gro ba la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because there is doubt about the pervasion.

original: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa ni ma bshad pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa ni ma bshad pa de'i phyir /
translated: Since the faults of nonpervasion, etc., are not mentioned,

original: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni ma grub pa nyid kyis skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni ma grub pa nyid kyis skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: the reason “because of being sound” is faulty in that it is unestablished.

original: ba dad na ni zhes bya ba ni rtsol las byung ba nyid chos can las tha dad na ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon med do zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: ba dad na ni zhes bya ba ni rtsol las byung ba nyid chos can las tha dad na ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon med do zhes bya bar ro //
translated: If it is different from the subject, “arising from effort,” then the fault of unestablished reason does not occur.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni tha dad med pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni tha dad med pas na'o //
translated: “Therefore” means because there is no difference.

original: phyogs yan lag zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyogs yan lag zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The property of the subject” means

original: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid sgra la gnas pa chos can yin par ma zad pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid sgra la gnas pa chos can yin par ma zad pa'o //
translated: not only that which is the basis of the sound, but also that which arises from effort.

original: sgra la gnas pa'i rtsol ba las byung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de las tha dad pa'am /
analyzed: sgra la gnas pa'i rtsol ba las byung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de las tha dad pa'am /
translated: The property of the subject that is to be established, which is different from that which is the basis of the sound and arises from effort,

original: yang na dpe'i chos can de la ni tha dad pa la ni'o //
analyzed: yang na dpe'i chos can de la ni tha dad pa la ni'o //
translated: or the example that is different from that,

original: gnod med phyir te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir te de dang de ma yin pa la brten pa ni sgrub pa'i byed pa'am grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod med phyir te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir te de dang de ma yin pa la brten pa ni sgrub pa'i byed pa'am grub pa ma yin no //
translated: is not established, because there is no contradiction, that is, because there is no harm.

original: phyogs kyi khyad par nyid yin yang sgrub par byed pa las tha dad pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos can no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi khyad par nyid yin yang sgrub par byed pa las tha dad pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos can no //
translated: Even though it is a particular of the subject, the property of the subject that is to be established is different from the proof.

original: yang na de las tha dad pa'i dpe'i chos can bum pa la sogs pa lam grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na de las tha dad pa'i dpe'i chos can bum pa la sogs pa lam grub pa ma yin te /
translated: Or, the example that is different from that is not established in a pot, etc.,

original: gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no harm.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi khyad par yin yang /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi khyad par yin yang /
translated: Even though it is a particular of the property of the subject that is to be established,

original: ma grub pa nyid du rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don @150a * //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid du rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don @150a * //
translated: There is no fault of non-pervasion.

original: to ; 'di dper brjod pa ni /
analyzed: to ; 'di dper brjod pa ni /
translated: The example is stated:

original: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example,

original: ci'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid 'gal ba ma yin snyam du dogs pa bsu nas /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid 'gal ba ma yin snyam du dogs pa bsu nas /
translated: why is the reason not contradictory?🔽The response is: because there is pervasion.

original: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement the probandum... is the probandum.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba nyid du'o //
translated: The statement in that way... is the connection.

original: 'on te phyogs kyi yan lag yin na bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te phyogs kyi yan lag yin na bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa ci ltar zhe na /
translated: But if it is a part of the thesis, how is there a connection with the probandum?

original: 'brel pa de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that connection... is the connection.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa mi 'gal bas na'o //🔽gtan tshigs yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa mi 'gal bas na'o // gtan tshigs yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The statement therefore... is because the connection is non-contradictory.

original: ma grub min zhes bya ba 'di'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ma grub min zhes bya ba 'di'i bshad pa'o //
translated: The statement it is a reason is the explanation of it is not unestablished.

original: yang na sgrub par byed pa rtsol ba las byung ba nyid /
analyzed: yang na sgrub par byed pa rtsol ba las byung ba nyid /
translated: Or, the statement it is a proof is the arising from effort.

original: bsgrub bya des pa'i dus na phyogs kyi khyad par nyid khas blang par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya des pa'i dus na phyogs kyi khyad par nyid khas blang par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: The object to be established is not to be accepted as a specific property at the time of the proof.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgra'i rang bzhin rtogs par byas nas rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i rang bzhin rtogs par byas nas rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, having understood the nature of the word, the effort that arises is reversed.

original: khyad par ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The specific property

original: khyad par ni gdon mi za bar bsgrub par bya ba nye bar mtshon pa ste nges pa'i dus na yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par ni gdon mi za bar bsgrub par bya ba nye bar mtshon pa ste nges pa'i dus na yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The specific property is certainly indicated by the object to be established, but it does not exist at the time of the ascertainment.

original: lhas byin gyis zhes bya ba ni srog chags tsam gyis nye bar mtshon par byed do //
analyzed: lhas byin gyis zhes bya ba ni srog chags tsam gyis nye bar mtshon par byed do //
translated: Devadatta indicates merely a living being.

original: de nyid kyi phyir lha skyabs la sogs pa'i khyim nye bar mtshon nas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir lha skyabs la sogs pa'i khyim nye bar mtshon nas zhes gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, it is said that the house of Devadatta and so on is indicated.

original: de zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon byed du gyur pa'i bya rog go //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon byed du gyur pa'i bya rog go //
translated: That is the crow, which becomes the indicator.

original: de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'o //
translated: The result of that is the proponent of the conclusion.

original: khad  par zhes bya ba ni mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i khyim las khyad par du gyur pas na khyad par ste lhas sbyin la sogs pa'i khyim ste /
analyzed: khad  par zhes bya ba ni mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i khyim las khyad par du gyur pas na khyad par ste lhas sbyin la sogs pa'i khyim ste /
translated: The word “house” means a house that is different from the house of a sacrificer, etc., and so is different, i.e., the house of Devadatta, etc.

original: de'i mthar thug pa'i blo gang la yod pa ste yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mthar thug pa'i blo gang la yod pa ste yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word “householder” means one who has the idea of the finality of that house, because he has it.

original: nye bar mtshon pa zhes bya ba ni chos can las tha dad pa rtsol ba las byung ba nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa zhes bya ba ni chos can las tha dad pa rtsol ba las byung ba nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word “illustration” means that which is different from the subject, such as being produced, etc.

original: des na bye brag spyi chos tha //
analyzed: des na bye brag spyi chos tha //
translated: Therefore, the difference of the universal from the particular

original: dad phyir rtags dang rtags can nyid //
analyzed: dad phyir rtags dang rtags can nyid //
translated: is the sign and the possession of the sign.

original: ces bya ba'i don dpyod pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i don dpyod pa ni /
translated: The meaning of this is analyzed as follows:

original: gal te chos can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te chos can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is called the subject,

original: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid kyang dam bcas pa'i don gyis phyogs gcig nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid kyang dam bcas pa'i don gyis phyogs gcig nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //
translated: then being produced and impermanent would also be only one part of the thesis.

original: ldog mtshams tha dad pa med pa'i phyir chos tha dad pa med pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: ldog mtshams tha dad pa med pa'i phyir chos tha dad pa med pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The anticipation of the doubt that there is no difference in the property because there is no difference in the limit of negation is:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said,

original: de tsam nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sgra tsam nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de tsam nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sgra tsam nyid kyis so //
translated: “By that alone” means by the mere word.

original: de skad du yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis chos mngon ba'i bstan bcos las bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de skad du yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis chos mngon ba'i bstan bcos las bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is explained in the Abhidharma treatise by Master Vasubandhu.

original: phan tshun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ldog pa'i dbye ba ston pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ldog pa'i dbye ba ston pa'o //
translated: “Mutually” and so on teaches the classification of the reverse.

original: sgra nyid dang mnyan bya nyid dag ni /
analyzed: sgra nyid dang mnyan bya nyid dag ni /
translated: Sound and the quality of being heard

original: ldog pa gcig gi mthar thug pas @150b phan tshun nang du 'du bar brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa gcig gi mthar thug pas @150b phan tshun nang du 'du bar brjod pa yin te /
translated: are included in each other because they are included in the same reverse.

original: gal te der gyur na ni de'i tshe 'di gnyis tha dad par rigs pa dang ldan pa min par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gal te der gyur na ni de'i tshe 'di gnyis tha dad par rigs pa dang ldan pa min par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If that were the case, then it would not be reasonable for these two to be different.

original: 'on kyang ldog pas brtags pa'i chos tha dad pa yod pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang ldog pas brtags pa'i chos tha dad pa yod pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: However, it is said that there is a difference in the phenomena that are designated by the reverse.

original: don gzhan dang ni zhes bya ba'o don gzhan nyan pa'i shes pa dang 'brel pa dang ma 'brel pa yang sgra la yod pa yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan dang ni zhes bya ba'o don gzhan nyan pa'i shes pa dang 'brel pa dang ma 'brel pa yang sgra la yod pa yin no //
translated: “With another object” means that sound has a different object, which is connected to or not connected to the consciousness of hearing.

original: de ltar gyur dang mnyan bya nyid ni sgra nyid las tha dad par gsal ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur dang mnyan bya nyid ni sgra nyid las tha dad par gsal ba kho na'o //
translated: Thus, the hearer is clearly distinct from the sound itself.

original: mnyan bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par 'grel ba'o //
analyzed: mnyan bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par 'grel ba'o //
translated: The words “the hearer” and so on are the commentary.

original: mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa med pa zhes bya ba ni /🔽rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i sgra la ni 'on pa ma yin pa'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa med pa zhes bya ba ni / rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i sgra la ni 'on pa ma yin pa'i dbang du byas te /
translated: “ The nonexistence of the nonhearer” means🔽that the sound that is heard by one who is not deaf is not a nonhearer.

original: mnyan bya ma yin pa nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: mnyan bya ma yin pa nyid med pa'o //
translated: “ The nonexistence of the nonhearable” means🔽that the sound that is heard by one who is not deaf is not a nonhearable.

original: tshogs pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rna ba mi gsang ba la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: tshogs pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rna ba mi gsang ba la sogs pa las so //
translated: “ Because of the nonexistence of the collection” means that the sound is not a nonhearable because of the nonexistence of the collection of the ear, the sound, and so on.

original: skyes bu gzhan la zhes bya ba ni 'on pa dang yul thag ring po la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: skyes bu gzhan la zhes bya ba ni 'on pa dang yul thag ring po la sogs pa la'o //
translated: “ The other person” means the deaf person and the person who is far away.

original: sgra ma yin par ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgra ma yin par ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ The sound is not a non-sound” means

original: skyes bu gzhan la ltos kyang sgra sgras ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: skyes bu gzhan la ltos kyang sgra sgras ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: that the sound is not a non-sound even in relation to the other person.

original: 'on kyang sgra kho na'o ;
analyzed: 'on kyang sgra kho na'o ;
translated: It is a sound.

original: / ldog pa tha dad pa'i mjug sdud pa ni /
analyzed: / ldog pa tha dad pa'i mjug sdud pa ni /
translated: The conclusion of the distinction of the reversal is

original: mnyan bya ma yin pa las log pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mnyan bya ma yin pa las log pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ because of the reversal of the nonhearable.”

original: 'o na mnyan bya ma yin pa las ldog pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na mnyan bya ma yin pa las ldog pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the point of the exclusion of what is not to be heard?

original: mnyan bya nyid de ltar zhes bya ba mnyan bya ma yin pa las ldog par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid de ltar zhes bya ba mnyan bya ma yin pa las ldog par 'gyur gyi /
translated: It is this: the state of being what is to be heard is the exclusion of what is not to be heard.

original: sgra nyid ni de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra nyid ni de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: But sound itself is not like that.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgra nyid de ni'o //
analyzed: sgra nyid de ni'o //
translated: Because sound itself is that.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ldog pas brtags pa'i dbye ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ldog pas brtags pa'i dbye ba bstan pa ni /
translated: This is the explanation of the division of the exclusion as imagined.

original: slob dpon gyis ci skad du gsungs pa de ni legs par bshad pa yin no zhes mchod pa dang 'brel to //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ci skad du gsungs pa de ni legs par bshad pa yin no zhes mchod pa dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with the praise: “What the master has said is well said.”

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos tshad ma kun las btus pa'i 'grel par gang gsungs pa de bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos tshad ma kun las btus pa'i 'grel par gang gsungs pa de bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of what the master Dignāga said in the Compendium of Valid Knowledge.

original: yang na slob dpon gyis gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid bshad pa yin gyi lhag pa ni ma yin pa'o /
analyzed: yang na slob dpon gyis gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid bshad pa yin gyi lhag pa ni ma yin pa'o /
translated: Or, what the master said is just the explanation, not anything else.

original: slob dpon nyid kyis rtsod pa dang lan mdzad pas 'di dag nyid 'dir bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: slob dpon nyid kyis rtsod pa dang lan mdzad pas 'di dag nyid 'dir bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The master himself composed the debate and the replies. The point is that these are the very ones that are explained here.

original: gsungs pa'i tshul bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gsungs pa'i tshul bstan pa ni /
translated: The method of teaching is as follows.

original: gal te zhes bya ba nas skyon yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba nas skyon yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: The passage from “If” up to “is a fault” is the method of teaching.

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos ni /🔽'dir ni gtan tshigs nyer gtod kyis //
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos ni / 'dir ni gtan tshigs nyer gtod kyis //
translated: The master Dignaga says:🔽Here, the reason is not contradictory

original: bsgrub bya de ni 'gal ldan min //
analyzed: bsgrub bya de ni 'gal ldan min //
translated: to the probandum.

original: zhes bya ba skabs 'dir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba skabs 'dir /
translated: In this context,

original: sgra nyid kyi mtshan nyid thams cad ma yin pa nyid ni /
analyzed: sgra nyid kyi mtshan nyid thams cad ma yin pa nyid ni /
translated: the non-universality of sound itself as a characteristic

original: sgra mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyis ma grub pa yin par gsungs pa na /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyis ma grub pa yin par gsungs pa na /
translated: is not established because it is only one part of the meaning of the thesis in the proof that sound is impermanent.

original: @151a * // rtsod par byed pas gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khrul par byed de /🔽dam bcas pa'i don gyis phyogs gcig kyang yin la /
analyzed: @151a * // rtsod par byed pas gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khrul par byed de / dam bcas pa'i don gyis phyogs gcig kyang yin la /
translated: When this is said, the opponent makes a mistake, saying “If” and so on.

original: sgrub par byed pa yang yin mod ces so //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yang yin mod ces so //
translated: He says, “It is indeed one part of the meaning of the thesis, but it is also a proof.”

original: 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan sbyor ba 'dis so //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan sbyor ba 'dis so //
translated: Here, the response to this is as follows.

original: mig la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa rnams kyi nang nas mig la sogs pa kho na dam bcas pa'i don yin pa'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa rnams kyi nang nas mig la sogs pa kho na dam bcas pa'i don yin pa'o //
translated: “The eye, etc.” means that among the collections, the eye, etc. are the meaning of the thesis.

original: de'i phyogs gcig ces bya ba 'dus byas kyi phyogs gcig kyang dam bcas pa'i don yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig ces bya ba 'dus byas kyi phyogs gcig kyang dam bcas pa'i don yin pa'o //
translated: “One part of it” means that one part of the conditioned is also the meaning of the thesis.

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The general and specific things are the probandum and the probans. This is the meaning.

original: ci ste yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod par don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod par don ni 'di yin te /
translated: “But if, etc.” is a dispute. The meaning is this.

original: sgra mi rtag ste sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ma grub par ni ma 'thad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ma grub par ni ma 'thad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: This reason, “Sound is impermanent because it is sound,” is not tenable as unestablished; it is only a non-common inconclusive reason.

original: sgra nyid ni sgra kho na la gnas te /
analyzed: sgra nyid ni sgra kho na la gnas te /
translated: Soundness is present only in sound.

original: des na thun mong ma yin pa kho na yin pas de ci ltar ma grub pa nyid du brjod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na thun mong ma yin pa kho na yin pas de ci ltar ma grub pa nyid du brjod ces bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, since it is only a non-common reason, how can it be said to be unestablished?

original: de ltar ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mthar don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mthar don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is in the conclusion beginning with “Thus, . . .”

original: chos can dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos las ltos te tha dad pa'i chos gang yin pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can nyid la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin par rigs te /
analyzed: chos can dang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos las ltos te tha dad pa'i chos gang yin pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can nyid la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin par rigs te /
translated: Any property that is different from the subject and the property to be established, and that is based on the property to be established itself, is reasonable as the uncommon reason.

original: dper na mnyan bya nyid sgra nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid las ldog pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa yin pa des na de ma nges sa nyid du 'thad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mnyan bya nyid sgra nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid las ldog pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa yin pa des na de ma nges sa nyid du 'thad pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the property of being audible is different from the property of being impermanent by the division of being the opposite of sound. Therefore, it is reasonable as the uncommon reason for the impermanence of sound.

original: sgra nyid ni chos can las ldog pa'i dbye bas kyang tha dad pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra nyid ni chos can las ldog pa'i dbye bas kyang tha dad pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Sound itself is not different by the division of being the opposite of the subject,

original: chos can nyid sgrub byed nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can nyid sgrub byed nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the subject itself is posited as the property to be established.

original: des na 'di ni ma grub pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: des na 'di ni ma grub pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, this is only unestablished.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
translated: It is not an uncommon inconclusive reason.

original: ma grub pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgra ni thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa nyid sel ba'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgra ni thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa nyid sel ba'o //
translated: The word “only” in “nonestablished only” eliminates the uncommon inconclusive.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba la yang ngo //
translated: “In that” refers to the expression of the definition of the reason.

original: de dbye ba ni phyogs chos kyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de dbye ba ni phyogs chos kyi dbye ba'o //
translated: “Its division” is the division of the property of the subject.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang pa'i sngon du bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang pa'i sngon du bstan par bya ste /
translated: The fallacious reasons should be taught prior to that.

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi sngon rol tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi sngon rol tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: The definition of the reason and the definition of the fallacious reason should be stated prior to that.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽gang gi phyogs kyi chos nyid gang yin de phal cher ni mang du ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / gang gi phyogs kyi chos nyid gang yin de phal cher ni mang du ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin la /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because the property of the subject that is common to the members of a class is mostly a fallacious reason,

original: phyogs kyi chos 'ga' zhig ni yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos 'ga' zhig ni yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: and the property of the subject that is common to some members of a class is a correct reason.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gal te yang de la rigs mthun @151b pa yod kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang por brjod par rigs kyi /
analyzed: gal te yang de la rigs mthun @151b pa yod kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang por brjod par rigs kyi /
translated: If you say, “Even though there is a reason that is similar to the property of the position, etc.,” it is correct to state the first apparent reason.

original: 'on kyang 'di gnyis ba zhag nas phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan pa gang yin pa de ni dgos pa gzhan bsgrub pa'i ched du yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di gnyis ba zhag nas phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan pa gang yin pa de ni dgos pa gzhan bsgrub pa'i ched du yin no //
translated: However, the second one is taught in order to accomplish another purpose.

original: phyogs kyi chos la ni gtan tshigs kyang srid la /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la ni gtan tshigs kyang srid la /
translated: With regard to the property of the position, it is possible that there is a reason,

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yang srid do //🔽de la gal te tha dad par phyogs kyi chos 'di ni gtan tshigs nyid yin la /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yang srid do // de la gal te tha dad par phyogs kyi chos 'di ni gtan tshigs nyid yin la /
translated: and it is possible that there is an apparent reason.🔽If it is not taught that this property of the position is a reason

original: 'di ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes bstan par ma byas na /🔽de'i tshe slob ma rnams ci phyogs kyi chos 'di gtan tshigs yin nam /
analyzed: 'di ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes bstan par ma byas na / de'i tshe slob ma rnams ci phyogs kyi chos 'di gtan tshigs yin nam /
translated: and that this is an apparent reason,🔽then at that time students would be confused about whether this property of the position is a reason

original: de ste gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes rmongs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ste gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes rmongs par 'gyur ro //
translated: or whether it is an apparent reason.

original: des na gtan tshigs su gyur pa'i phyogs chos la gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i blo dang / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba la yang gtan tshigs kyi blor mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs su gyur pa'i phyogs chos la gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i blo dang / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba la yang gtan tshigs kyi blor mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to distinguish the property of the position which is a reason from the cognition which is a pseudo-reason, and in order to distinguish the pseudo-reason from the cognition which is a reason,

original: de ltar phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yin no //
translated: the classification of the property of the position has been taught.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement of that is:

original: phyogs chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The property of the position, etc.

original: mthun phyogs nam mkha' bum pa rdza //
analyzed: mthun phyogs nam mkha' bum pa rdza //
translated: The homogeneous position is space, pot, and vase.

original: mkha' dang nam mkha' bar snang la //
analyzed: mkha' dang nam mkha' bar snang la //
translated: In space, sky, and the sky,🔽lightning, sky, lightning, pot,

original: glog dang bar snang glog bum dang // nam mkha' dang ni rdul phran no //
analyzed: glog dang bar snang glog bum dang // nam mkha' dang ni rdul phran no //
translated: space, and atom.

original: zhes bya ba rnam pa dgu po dag ni phreng ba gsum pa'i re'u mig dgu po rnams su go rims bzhin bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba rnam pa dgu po dag ni phreng ba gsum pa'i re'u mig dgu po rnams su go rims bzhin bri bar bya'o //
translated: These nine kinds are to be written in the nine squares of the third garland, in order.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs rnams pa dgu bris pa de la rim pa bzhin du phyogs kyi chos 'ga' zhig ni yod pa yin la /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs rnams pa dgu bris pa de la rim pa bzhin du phyogs kyi chos 'ga' zhig ni yod pa yin la /
translated: In the writing of the nine kinds of homogeneous position, some of the properties of the position are present,

original: 'ga' zhig ni med pa /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni med pa /
translated: and some are absent.

original: 'ga' zhig ni rnam pa gnyi gar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni rnam pa gnyi gar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Some are of both types.

original: gal te de ltar na rnam pa gsum du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na rnam pa gsum du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If this is so, there are three types of reason.

original: rnam pa dgu por go rims ci ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: rnam pa dgu por go rims ci ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: How are they distributed into nine types?

original: re re dag la yang rnam gsum zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: re re dag la yang rnam gsum zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said that each is of three types.

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang gang zhig med pa dang / gang zhig gnyi ga yin par brjod pa de nyid re re yang rnam pa gsum gsum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang gang zhig med pa dang / gang zhig gnyi ga yin par brjod pa de nyid re re yang rnam pa gsum gsum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the reason that exists in the similar class and does not exist in the dissimilar class and that which is said to be both is each of three types.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: brjod pa mi mthun phyogs la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brjod pa mi mthun phyogs la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said that it also exists in the dissimilar class.

original: bum pa bar snang glog dang mkha' //
analyzed: bum pa bar snang glog dang mkha' //
translated: A pot, space, lightning, and the sky,🔽A pot, a clay pot, a lightning pot,

original: bum pa rdza ma glog bum dang // rdza ma nam mkha' bum de ni //🔽de bzhin mi mthun phyogs rnams dgu //
analyzed: bum pa rdza ma glog bum dang // rdza ma nam mkha' bum de ni // de bzhin mi mthun phyogs rnams dgu //
translated: A clay pot, space, a pot,🔽Are the nine dissimilar classes.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs re mig dgu pa //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs re mig dgu pa //
translated: The similar class is the nine squares.

original: de bris pa de la yang /
analyzed: de bris pa de la yang /
translated: Having drawn that,

original: rim pa bzhin yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyi gas so sor rnam pa gsum gsum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyi gas so sor rnam pa gsum gsum du 'gyur ro //
translated: each is of three types, respectively, by existing, not existing, and both.

original: des na phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu yin no //
analyzed: des na phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu yin no //
translated: Therefore, there are nine types of property of the subject.

original: phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu'i @152a * //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu'i @152a * //
translated: The nature of the nine types of property of the subject

original: rang bzhin yang mdun du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin yang mdun du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: will be explained later.

original: gang phyir gtan tshigs dag dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa'i don du phyogs snga ma 'god pa ni /
analyzed: gang phyir gtan tshigs dag dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa'i don du phyogs snga ma 'god pa ni /
translated: The opponent’s position is set forth in the passage beginning with “because of the reasonings” in order to explain the meaning of the passage beginning with “because of the reasonings.”

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The passage beginning with “if” is the opponent’s position.

original: gtan tshigs dag dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dag dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The passage beginning with “because of the reasonings” is the philosophical theory.

original: gang gi phyir bde bar 'chad pa dang 'jig par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi phyir rnam 'gel mdzad pas bshad la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bde bar 'chad pa dang 'jig par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi phyir rnam 'gel mdzad pas bshad la /
translated: Because of the reasonings, the master Dignāga explained the meaning of the passage beginning with “because of the reasonings” in order to make it easy to understand and easy to remember.

original: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba'i don /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba'i don /
translated: The meaning of the passage beginning with “because of the reasonings”

original: mdos mdor bsdus te brjod pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mdos mdor bsdus te brjod pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: is stated in brief in the root text.

original: bde bar gzung ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde bar gzung ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is easy to understand and easy to remember.

original: gang zhig bde bar gzung ba grub pa'i phyir yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig bde bar gzung ba grub pa'i phyir yin zhe na /
translated: What is easy to understand and easy to remember?

original: skabs kyi gtan tshigs kyi rab tu byed pa'i don nyid do ;
analyzed: skabs kyi gtan tshigs kyi rab tu byed pa'i don nyid do ;
translated: The meaning of the passage beginning with “because of the reasonings” in the context of the chapter on reasoning.

original: / de nyid kyi phyir rnam par bshad pa las /
analyzed: / de nyid kyi phyir rnam par bshad pa las /
translated: it says,

original: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu byed pa'i don nyid bde blag tu gzung ba'i don du'o zhes so //🔽gtan tshigs kyi rab tu byed pa ni zhes rjes su brjod nas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu byed pa'i don nyid bde blag tu gzung ba'i don du'o zhes so // gtan tshigs kyi rab tu byed pa ni zhes rjes su brjod nas /
translated: “In order to easily grasp the meaning of the Pramanavarttika itself.”🔽After stating, “The Pramanavarttika,”🔽it says,

original: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i /
translated: “The meaning of the Pramanavarttika is as follows.”

original: don re zhig ston pa ni /🔽gtan tshigs dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don re zhig ston pa ni / gtan tshigs dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It then explains the meaning of the Pramanavarttika.🔽The word “hetu” in the title Pramanavarttika is a reference to the word “hetu” in the title Hetucakranirnaya.🔽Therefore, the word “pramanavarttika” refers to a text that teaches hetu and hetvabhasa.

original: gtan tshigs rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba 'dir gtan tshigs smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba 'dir gtan tshigs smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The word “artha” in the title Hetvarthanirnaya is a reference to the word “artha” in the title Pramanavarttika.

original: des na gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ston par byed pa'i tshig la rab tu byed pa zhes brjod pa yin no //🔽don gyi sgra rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ston par byed pa'i tshig la rab tu byed pa zhes brjod pa yin no // don gyi sgra rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the word “hetvarthanirnaya” refers to a text that explains the meaning of the word “artha” in the title Pramanavarttika.

original: de'i don ni zhes bya ba ni ste rab tu byed pa de'i don to //🔽de gang yin zhen /
analyzed: de'i don ni zhes bya ba ni ste rab tu byed pa de'i don to // de gang yin zhen /
translated: The word “hetu” in the title Hetvarthanirnaya is a reference to the word “hetu” in the title Hetucakranirnaya.

original: gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the word “hetvartha” refers to a text that teaches hetu and hetvabhasa.

original: gal te gtan tshigs rab tu byed pa'i zhes bya ba'i sgras gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci ltar shes snyam na de nyid kyi phyir zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs rab tu byed pa'i zhes bya ba'i sgras gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci ltar shes snyam na de nyid kyi phyir zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you wonder how it is known that the words “in the chapter on reasons” refer to reasons and fallacious reasons, then the response is:🔽Because of that, the words “in the chapter on reasons” refer to reasons and fallacious reasons.

original: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgras gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang brjod pa de nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang gi mngon du zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgras gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang brjod pa de nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang gi mngon du zhes gsungs so //
translated: That is why it says, “fallacious reasons are directly refuted.”

original: de nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: It is commenting on that.

original: gtan tshigs dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words “reasons and” are the response.

original: phyogs chos zhes bya ba 'di mi rigs par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: phyogs chos zhes bya ba 'di mi rigs par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The words “the property of the subject” are not correct.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is “If you say . . .”

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid du nye bar bsdus pa'i chos ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid du nye bar bsdus pa'i chos ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: The property that is included in the property of the subject is not the proof.

original: 'di ga las snyam na nags tshang tshing zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ga las snyam na nags tshang tshing zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Where is that known? “In the dense forest.”

original: des na phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes ci ltar brjod snyam pa'o //
analyzed: des na phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes ci ltar brjod snyam pa'o //
translated: Therefore, how can it be said that the property of the subject is the reason?

original: 'o na phyogs chos can tsam yin la rag go zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na phyogs chos can tsam yin la rag go zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the property of the subject is merely the subject,

original: chos can tsam ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: chos can tsam ni zhes smos so //
translated: [the root text] states, “The mere subject . . . .”

original: grub kyang bsgrub par bya ba ci ste ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: grub kyang bsgrub par bya ba ci ste ma yin snyam na /
translated: If it is argued that even if it is established, why is it not the probandum,

original: chos kyi @152b khyad par can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi @152b khyad par can gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: [the root text] states, “The property of the subject that is . . . .”

original: des na phyogs chos zhes bya ba ni mi 'thad do snyam na /
analyzed: des na phyogs chos zhes bya ba ni mi 'thad do snyam na /
translated: If it is thought that therefore the property of the subject is not tenable,

original: 'di la lan de ni bden te zhes bya ba'o //🔽'dir phyogs kyi sgras gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul chos dang chos can tshogs pa'i phyogs ni mi gzung ste /
analyzed: 'di la lan de ni bden te zhes bya ba'o // 'dir phyogs kyi sgras gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul chos dang chos can tshogs pa'i phyogs ni mi gzung ste /
translated: the response to that is, “This is true . . . .”

original: de bzung na ni de'i chos su gtan tshigs thams cad ma grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzung na ni de'i chos su gtan tshigs thams cad ma grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the term “subject” does not refer to the subject that is the locus of the reason, because if it did, then all reasons would not be established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyi'i don bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i don bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning of the general is to be established.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni chos can dang / chos tshogs pa'i don 'di yin la /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni chos can dang / chos tshogs pa'i don 'di yin la /
translated: The probandum is the meaning of the collection of the subject and the property.

original: de yang ma grub pa'i phyir de'i chos su gtan tshigs ci ltar grub /
analyzed: de yang ma grub pa'i phyir de'i chos su gtan tshigs ci ltar grub /
translated: Moreover, since that is not established, how could the reason be established as a property of that?

original: grub na yang rjes su dpag pa don med par ci ltar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: grub na yang rjes su dpag pa don med par ci ltar mi 'gyur /
translated: And if it is established, then why would inference be pointless?

original: de'i phyir shes par 'dod pa'i chos kyi khyad par can ni phyogs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes par 'dod pa'i chos kyi khyad par can ni phyogs yin no //
translated: Therefore, the subject is the property of the object of knowledge that is to be established.

original: de'i chos su yang gtan tshigs ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i chos su yang gtan tshigs ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: And the reason is not unestablished as a property of that.

original: gal te shes par 'dod pa ci ltar khyad par nyid yin te /
analyzed: gal te shes par 'dod pa ci ltar khyad par nyid yin te /
translated: If it is asked, “How is the object of knowledge itself a property?”

original: bsgrub par 'dod pas na ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs na /
analyzed: bsgrub par 'dod pas na ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs na /
translated: Because it is not established by the one who wishes to prove it.

original: gang gi phyir chos can tsam la bsgrub bya nyid du zhes bya bas /🔽shes par 'dod pa'i chos kyis khyad par du byas pa nyid du nye bar 'dogs pa de'i phyir /🔽nye bar brtags pa'i bsgrub bya'i khyad par can ni phyogs yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos can tsam la bsgrub bya nyid du zhes bya bas / shes par 'dod pa'i chos kyis khyad par du byas pa nyid du nye bar 'dogs pa de'i phyir / nye bar brtags pa'i bsgrub bya'i khyad par can ni phyogs yin la /
translated: Since it is said, “The subject alone is what is to be established,”🔽the object of knowledge is designated as the property that distinguishes it.🔽Therefore, the subject is the property of the object of knowledge that is to be established.

original: de'i chos ni de'i rang bzhin nges par byed pa'i dus na phyogs kyi chos kyi gtan tshigs su rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i chos ni de'i rang bzhin nges par byed pa'i dus na phyogs kyi chos kyi gtan tshigs su rtogs par bya'o //
translated: And the reason is understood as the property of the subject when the nature of that is ascertained.

original: khyab pa nges pa'i dus na ni /
analyzed: khyab pa nges pa'i dus na ni /
translated: When the pervasion is ascertained,

original: chos can tsam la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar 'dogs pa yin te ;
analyzed: chos can tsam la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du nye bar 'dogs pa yin te ;
translated: the probandum is figuratively designated as the mere subject.

original: de lta ma yin na tshogs pas rjes su 'gro ba med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na tshogs pas rjes su 'gro ba med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow that the collection lacks concomitance.

original: ci ltar 'di gnyis kho na la nye bar gdags snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'di gnyis kho na la nye bar gdags snyam na /
translated: How are these two figuratively designated?

original: phyogs gcig phyir zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: phyogs gcig phyir zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because of the one-sidedness.

original: gtan tshigs kyi zhes bya ba nas ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pas ni /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi zhes bya ba nas ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pas ni /
translated: From the object of the function of the reason up to because of non-establishment,

original: gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul phyogs su ston pas tshogs don bsgrub bya nyid yin phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul phyogs su ston pas tshogs don bsgrub bya nyid yin phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it shows the direction of the object of the function of the reason. The meaning of the collection is because of being the probandum.

original: de rnam par 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: de rnam par 'grel pa'o //
translated: This is the commentary.

original: 'dis ni 'di 'dra ba'i phyogs la ltos nas gtan tshigs thams cad kyang ma grub pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di 'dra ba'i phyogs la ltos nas gtan tshigs thams cad kyang ma grub pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: By this, it is shown that all reasons are non-established with respect to such a position.

original: da ni phyogs gang la ltos nas gtan tshigs ma grub pa de ston pa ni /
analyzed: da ni phyogs gang la ltos nas gtan tshigs ma grub pa de ston pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to show the position with respect to which the reason is non-established,

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it says therefore.

original: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs kyi byed pa yin yang phyogs nyid du 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs kyi byed pa yin yang phyogs nyid du 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: Because, although it is the function of the reason, it is not held to be the position itself.

original: de ni ma grub pas na gtan tshigs thams cad ma grub par thal ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni ma grub pas na gtan tshigs thams cad ma grub par thal ba yin no //
translated: Since that is not established, it follows that all reasons are not established.

original: ci ltar ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni shes par 'dod pa'i don ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyis ma grub pa yin na /🔽ma grub pa yang ci ltar khyad par yin /
analyzed: ci ltar ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni shes par 'dod pa'i don ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyis ma grub pa yin na / ma grub pa yang ci ltar khyad par yin /
translated: How is it not established? That which is desired to be known is not established by the probandum itself.

original: nye bar brtag pa'i @153a * //
analyzed: nye bar brtag pa'i @153a * //
translated: How can that which is not established be a distinction?

original: phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it is imputed.

original: gal te yang chos can la khyad par ma grub pa de lta na yang khyad par nye bar btags pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te yang chos can la khyad par ma grub pa de lta na yang khyad par nye bar btags pa yin te /
translated: Even though the distinction is not established in the subject, still the distinction is imputed.

original: des na nye bar btags pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can gyi chos ni gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: des na nye bar btags pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can gyi chos ni gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: Therefore, the property of the subject distinguished by the imputed distinction is the reason.

original: phyogs 'di nyid kyi ni phyogs ni chos can te /
analyzed: phyogs 'di nyid kyi ni phyogs ni chos can te /
translated: This very position is the subject.

original: yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained that the general is imputed to the part, and so on.

original: phyogs ni shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: phyogs ni shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can no //
translated: The subject is the property-possessor that is qualified by the particular property that is to be known.

original: sngar bstan zin pas zhes bya ba ni le'u dang po'i 'grel par ro //
analyzed: sngar bstan zin pas zhes bya ba ni le'u dang po'i 'grel par ro //
translated: Since it was previously explained means in the commentary to the first chapter.

original: 'di ni yang na chos sam ni zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yang na chos sam ni zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o //
translated: This is an analysis of or the property.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni phyogs chos zhes bya ba de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni phyogs chos zhes bya ba de la'o //
translated: With respect to that, that is, with respect to the property of the subject.

original: chos can gyi chos smos pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni phyogs chos smos pa shes la /🔽chos can gyi smos pa bya ba yin te /
analyzed: chos can gyi chos smos pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni phyogs chos smos pa shes la / chos can gyi smos pa bya ba yin te /
translated: Because it is the property of the subject that is mentioned, that is, because the property of the subject is mentioned, the property of the subject is understood.

original: mig gis gzung ba nyid la sogs pa ni de nyid kyis sel ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //🔽ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
analyzed: mig gis gzung ba nyid la sogs pa ni de nyid kyis sel ba yin no zhes bya ba'o // ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
translated: The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.

original: yang gi sgras ni chos mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can gyi'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni chos mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can gyi'o //
translated: The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //🔽chos mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can gyi chos ni gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //🔽chos mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can gyi chos ni gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur te /
translated: The property of the subject is to be mentioned, because the property of the subject is mentioned is understood.🔽The property of the subject

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is said that the reason is not present in the dissimilar instances.

original: 'on te de mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med kyang yod pa yang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med kyang yod pa yang yin no zhe na /
translated: But even if it is not present in the dissimilar instances, it is present in the similar instances.

original: ci ltar zhes smos so //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes smos so //
translated: How?

original: mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can de nyid la yod pa dang / de nyid med ces bya bar te /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can de nyid la yod pa dang / de nyid med ces bya bar te /
translated: It is not the case that it is present in the very same subject that is the example of the dissimilar instances and that it is absent in the dissimilar instances.

original: mi 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: It is not so at all.

original: gang gi phyir de nyid la gtan tshigs yod pa dang med par mi 'thad pa de'i phyir 'os gzhan med pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid la gtan tshigs yod pa dang med par mi 'thad pa de'i phyir 'os gzhan med pas so //
translated: Because it is not tenable that the reason is present and absent in the very same subject, therefore, since there is no other alternative,

original: gang zhig yongs su gzung bar bya ba chos can gsum pa de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig yongs su gzung bar bya ba chos can gsum pa de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that third subject that is to be apprehended?

original: de yang zhes smos so //
analyzed: de yang zhes smos so //
translated: That also, he says.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
translated: No, etc. is the response.

original: rigs mthun nyid yod la zhes bya ba la ltos te /
analyzed: rigs mthun nyid yod la zhes bya ba la ltos te /
translated: In the case of the existence of the very same homogeneous

original: chos can gyi chos zhes yang brjod pa ni'o //
analyzed: chos can gyi chos zhes yang brjod pa ni'o //
translated: nature, the property of the subject is mentioned again.

original: nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba chos mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can gyi chos kho na gtan tshigs yin gyi /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba chos mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can gyi chos kho na gtan tshigs yin gyi /
translated: In order to definitely ascertain that, the property of the subject of the example that is similar to the probandum is the reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya bar ro //
translated: It is not the property of the subject of the probandum.

original: gal te chos can ma smos kyang rigs mthun pa kho na la zhes nges par gzung ba yod pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te chos can ma smos kyang rigs mthun pa kho na la zhes nges par gzung ba yod pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Even if the subject is not mentioned, is it not ascertained that it is only similar?

original: des na de'i don du chos can smos pas ci bya /
analyzed: des na de'i don du chos can smos pas ci bya /
translated: Then, what is the use of mentioning the subject for that purpose?🔽If you say that the subject of the probandum is taken because there is no other,

original: des na / 'o na gzhan med pas bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su gzung ngo zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: des na / 'o na gzhan med pas bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su gzung ngo zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: the response to that is,

original: gal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Even if the subject is not mentioned…”

original: ma yin te zhes bya @153b ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya @153b ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
translated: The response is “No, because…”

original: nyid kyi sgra rim pa bzhin du byas nas mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyid kyi sgra rim pa bzhin du byas nas mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The word “only” is used in sequence, so it becomes “existence in the similar class.”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba gzhan srid bas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba gzhan srid bas na'o //
translated: “Therefore” means because another ascertainment is possible.

original: nges par gzung ba'i phyir chos can smos par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i phyir chos can smos par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to be certain, the subject should be mentioned.

original: nges par gzung ba'i tshul brjod pa ni /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i tshul brjod pa ni /
translated: The way of expressing certainty is

original: de la zhes bya ba ste dpe'i chos can nyid la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ste dpe'i chos can nyid la'o //
translated: “in that,” i.e., in the example-subject.

original: gang gi phyir da ltar chos can smos pa des pa'i don yin par dogs par 'gyur ba des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir da ltar chos can smos pa des pa'i don yin par dogs par 'gyur ba des na'o //
translated: Since the subject is mentioned, it is suspected that it is the meaning of the reason.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: “But if…” and so on is the objection.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: “No” and so on is the response.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi chos zhes bya ba la yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la nye bar brtags pa nyid skyabs yin no //
