analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi chos zhes bya ba la yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la nye bar brtags pa nyid skyabs yin no //
translated: There, the property of the probandum is the subject. The property of the probandum is also the subject.

original: de lta ma yin te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yin na /
translated: Otherwise, if it were the property of the probandum,

original: de'i chos nyid ma grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i chos nyid ma grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be established as its property.

original: bsgrub par bya ba yang khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yang khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the probandum also a qualifier?

original: nye bar btags pas ci zhig bya snyam na /
analyzed: nye bar btags pas ci zhig bya snyam na /
translated: What is the use of the designation?

original: ma grub pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The unestablished…” and so on.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma grub pa yin la /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma grub pa yin la /
translated: The probandum is that which is not yet established.

original: ma grub pa ni nye bar btags pa med par rtags su gyur pa'i chos kyi khyad par du ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: ma grub pa ni nye bar btags pa med par rtags su gyur pa'i chos kyi khyad par du ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: How can that which is not yet established be a specific property of a reason that is not a designation?

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang phyogs kyi sgra gnyis don gcig pas khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di 'dra ba'i bstan pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang phyogs kyi sgra gnyis don gcig pas khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di 'dra ba'i bstan pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: Since the terms probandum and subject are synonymous, there is no difference between them.

original: phyogs zhes bya ba 'dis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs zhes bya ba 'dis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The term subject also means that which is called the subject.

original: ming dang ming can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dogs par ni don 'di yin te /
analyzed: ming dang ming can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dogs par ni don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of the doubt expressed in the phrase “the word and the bearer of the word” and so on is as follows.

original: phyogs chos zhes bstan pa na phyogs kyi sgra ni tshogs pa rjod par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: phyogs chos zhes bstan pa na phyogs kyi sgra ni tshogs pa rjod par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: When the term property of the subject is taught, the term subject expresses a collection,

original: shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag gis khyad par du gyur pa'i chos can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag gis khyad par du gyur pa'i chos can ni ma yin no //
translated: but not a specific property-possessor that is distinguished by a specific property that is desired to be known.

original: chos can la 'jug par 'dod pa yang yin te /
analyzed: chos can la 'jug par 'dod pa yang yin te /
translated: It is also desired to be engaged in the property-possessor.

original: des na chos can la phyogs kyi ming gdags par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: des na chos can la phyogs kyi ming gdags par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the term subject should not be designated to the property-possessor.

original: rtogs par dka' bar thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs par dka' bar thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it would follow that it would be difficult to understand.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'dir yang ming dang ming can gyi 'brel pa mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'dir yang ming dang ming can gyi 'brel pa mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “No” is the response. “Because it is a synonym” means that here also the relation between the name and the named is the same.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam grangs nyid 'jig rten gyi grags pas gsal bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam grangs nyid 'jig rten gyi grags pas gsal bar byed pa ste /
translated: The fact that it is a synonym of the probandum is clarified by what is well known in the world.

original: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Thus” means in that way.

original: phyogs kyis sgra bsgrub bya'i rnam grangs su slob dpon yang bzhed pa yin no zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs kyis sgra bsgrub bya'i rnam grangs su slob dpon yang bzhed pa yin no zhes ston pa ni /
translated: The master also accepts that the word “direction” is a synonym of the probandum. This is shown by “Thus.”

original: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Thus” means in that way.

original: ci'i phyir bsgrub bya nyid du nye bar 'dogs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bsgrub bya nyid du nye bar 'dogs she na /
translated: Why is it designated as the probandum?

original: nye bar btags pa med pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa med pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Without designation” means without the designation of the probandum.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod par ni don 'di yin te /🔽chos kyi khyad @154a * //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod par ni don 'di yin te / chos kyi khyad @154a * //
translated: The argument beginning with “If” has this meaning.🔽The property possessor that has the property of being the object to be inferred

original: par can gyi chos can ni rjes su dpag par bya bar brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: par can gyi chos can ni rjes su dpag par bya bar brjod pa yin na /
translated: is said to be the inferential sign.

original: 'di ni nye bar btags pa yang ma yin na de ci ltar nye bar btags nas chos can phyogs yin zhes rjod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nye bar btags pa yang ma yin na de ci ltar nye bar btags nas chos can phyogs yin zhes rjod ces bya ba'o //
translated: Since it is not even a designation, how could it be said that the subject is the position through designation?

original: de la ni zhes bya ba ni chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos can la'o //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bya ba ni chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos can la'o //
translated: “In that case” refers to the subject that is qualified by the property.

original: nye bar btags pa mi srid pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa mi srid pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: It is not impossible to designate it.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽der ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / der ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos kyi khyad par can gyi rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig la'o //
analyzed: chos kyi khyad par can gyi rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig la'o //
translated: “In that case” refers to the statement “it is the object of inference that is qualified by the property.”

original: 'di nyid la 'thad pa gzhan brjod pa ni 'di ltar ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la 'thad pa gzhan brjod pa ni 'di ltar ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The other justification for this is stated: “because it is like this.”

original: rgyu gnyis po 'di gnyis gsal bar byed pa ni /🔽rjes su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu gnyis po 'di gnyis gsal bar byed pa ni / rjes su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The two reasons are clarified:🔽“because it is designated as the object of attainment.”

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid nye bar btags pa kho na yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid nye bar btags pa kho na yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason is “because it is only the object of attainment that is designated.”

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: This is clarified:

original: nye bar btags pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “because of the designation.”

original: bzlog par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: bzlog par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The objection is anticipated:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If that is so,”

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is as follows:

original: ci ltar nye bar btags pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i cha'i khyad par ni phyogs yin la /🔽de'i chos ni gtan tshigs yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ci ltar nye bar btags pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i cha'i khyad par ni phyogs yin la / de'i chos ni gtan tshigs yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the specific property of the probandum, which is designated, is the position,🔽and its property is the reason,

original: nye bar btags pa'i chos can gyi khyad par can gyi chos ni phyogs yin la de'i chos ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa'i chos can gyi khyad par can gyi chos ni phyogs yin la de'i chos ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: in the same way, the property of the specific subject, which is designated, is the position, and its property is the reason.

original: phyogs zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: phyogs zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The term “position” is the reply.

original: phyogs brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dor nas khyad par bya ba'i chos can yongs su gzung ba'i don du yin te /
analyzed: phyogs brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dor nas khyad par bya ba'i chos can yongs su gzung ba'i don du yin te /
translated: The statement of the position is for the purpose of taking the subject that is qualified by the property to be proven, having abandoned the property to be proven.

original: des na mig gis gzung ba la sogs pa spangs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: des na mig gis gzung ba la sogs pa spangs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the eye and so on are abandoned.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bzung na ni gtan tshigs de'i chos mi srid pa'i kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bzung na ni gtan tshigs de'i chos mi srid pa'i kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: If the property to be proven is taken, then the reason would be impossible as its property,

original: chos rnams ni chos kyi gzhir mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams ni chos kyi gzhir mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because properties are impossible as the basis of a property.

original: srid na ni mig gis gzung ba nyid kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srid na ni mig gis gzung ba nyid kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were possible, then what is perceived by the eye would be the reason.

original: chos can sgra'i chos mi rtag pa nyid gang yin pa de'i chos ni mig gis gzung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: chos can sgra'i chos mi rtag pa nyid gang yin pa de'i chos ni mig gis gzung ba nyid yin no //
translated: The property of the subject, sound, is impermanence, and the property of that is being perceived by the eye.

original: bum pa la sogs pa la ni mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid dang 'brel par 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la ni mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid dang 'brel par 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: Being perceived by the eye is related to impermanence in a pot, etc.

original: sgra'i mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni bum pa la yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni bum pa la yang yod pa yin te /
translated: Whatever impermanence there is of sound is also present in a pot,

original: spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is what is to be established.

original: des na mig gis gzung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos su 'gyur gyi sgra'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na mig gis gzung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos su 'gyur gyi sgra'i ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, being perceived by the eye would be the property of impermanence, but not of sound.

original: gal te sgra la gnas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos ni mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te sgra la gnas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos ni mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t the property of sound’s impermanence not a universal?

original: 'on te mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi dang 'brel ba yin na de'i tshe chos can tsam dang yang 'brel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi dang 'brel ba yin na de'i tshe chos can tsam dang yang 'brel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is related to the universal of impermanence, then it would be related to the mere subject.

original: de ste chos can gyi khyad par dang ma 'brel na @154b de'i tshe sgra la gnas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid dang / 'brel par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ste chos can gyi khyad par dang ma 'brel na @154b de'i tshe sgra la gnas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid dang / 'brel par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is not related to a specific subject, then impermanence, which resides in sound, will not be related to it.

original: de ni ma yin te chos can ni khyad par du byed pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te chos can ni khyad par du byed pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: That is not so, because the subject is only that which is specified.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni spyi kho na yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni spyi kho na yin no //
translated: The probandum is only the universal.

original: des phyogs smos pa ni khyad par can gyi chos can gyi gzung ba'i don du yin no //
analyzed: des phyogs smos pa ni khyad par can gyi chos can gyi gzung ba'i don du yin no //
translated: The mention of the subject is for the purpose of grasping the specific subject.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin na /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin na /
translated: If the property of the probandum is the reason,

original: mig gis gzung ba ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: mig gis gzung ba ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: then what is grasped by the eye is not that,

original: des ni gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: so it would not be a reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi chos kyi tshad brjod pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi chos kyi tshad brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement of the measure of the property of the probandum is

original: gtan tshigs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: the reason, etc.

original: de ltar phyogs kyi rang bzhin brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyogs kyi rang bzhin brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the nature of the subject,

original: chos kyi tshig dang bsdu ba'i khyad par brjod pa ni /
analyzed: chos kyi tshig dang bsdu ba'i khyad par brjod pa ni /
translated: the statement of the distinction of the words of the property and the conclusion is

original: phyogs de'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs de'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: in the subject, etc.

original: thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dpe la rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dpe la rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: This is the application of the example.

original: sgra'i bdag nyid can gyi byas pa nyid bum pa la sogs pa'i bdag tu ci ltar 'gyur zhing bum pa la sogs pa de la yod par yang ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: sgra'i bdag nyid can gyi byas pa nyid bum pa la sogs pa'i bdag tu ci ltar 'gyur zhing bum pa la sogs pa de la yod par yang ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could the sound-nature of the produced become the nature of the pot, etc., and how could it exist in that pot, etc.?

original: sgra'i bdag nyid yin pas zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par gcod par bya ba brjod pa ni /
analyzed: sgra'i bdag nyid yin pas zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par gcod par bya ba brjod pa ni /
translated: The expression “because of being sound-nature” is an exclusion.

original: tha dad pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The object of exclusion is stated in the words “if they are different.”

original: 'dod pa yang ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs la'o //🔽chos can las tha dad pa'i rtags kyi rgyu ni rgyu las gzhan khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa yang ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs la'o // chos can las tha dad pa'i rtags kyi rgyu ni rgyu las gzhan khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: And it is not accepted that the reason is different from the property to be established.

original: rgyu nyid khyad par du 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu nyid khyad par du 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The reason that is different from the property possessor is not a cause that is different from the cause, because the cause itself is the difference.🔽This is the meaning.

original: de ltar gyur na zhes bya ba ni rgyu rtags kyi khyad par yin na'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na zhes bya ba ni rgyu rtags kyi khyad par yin na'o //
translated: If that were the case, the cause would be the difference of the reason.

original: gang gi phyir khyad par rnam par gcod par byed pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir phyogs khyad par yin par khas len pa yin na thun mong ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par rnam par gcod par byed pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir phyogs khyad par yin par khas len pa yin na thun mong ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Because it would not be a non-differentiator, therefore, if one accepts that the locus is a particular, it is not common.

original: phyogs khyad par ma yin par khas len na /
analyzed: phyogs khyad par ma yin par khas len na /
translated: If one accepts that the locus is not a particular,

original: yang ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: the error of non-establishment would occur again.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i don med pas na phyogs dang 'brel pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i don med pas na phyogs dang 'brel pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the property of the locus, the sixth case is meaningless, because there is no connection with the locus.

original: gal te nges par gzung bas ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa kho na brjod pa ma yin nam des na rab tu dbye ba 'di tsam du ci ltar 'gyur snyam na ldog par byed pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te nges par gzung bas ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa kho na brjod pa ma yin nam des na rab tu dbye ba 'di tsam du ci ltar 'gyur snyam na ldog par byed pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said: “Isn’t it that by the specification, only the possession of another is excluded? Then how could this distinction be made?” It is said: “by the differentiator.”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i zhes smos te tshig phrad kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes smos te tshig phrad kyi'o //
translated: It is said: “of that,” which is a verbal prefix.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod na'o //
translated: “Otherwise” means if the non-possession is excluded.

original: rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: “Disputation” means a dispute.

original: lan ni 'ba' zhig ni zhes bya ba ste tshig phrad dang 'brel ba dang 'brel pa'i'o //🔽gang gi tshe khyad par dang khyad par can dang / bya ba dang lhan @155a * //
analyzed: lan ni 'ba' zhig ni zhes bya ba ste tshig phrad dang 'brel ba dang 'brel pa'i'o // gang gi tshe khyad par dang khyad par can dang / bya ba dang lhan @155a * //
translated: “Reply” means a response.

original: cig tshig brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe ni /
analyzed: cig tshig brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe ni /
translated: When a qualifier, a qualified object, and an action are expressed together,🔽then

original: tshig phrad dang 'brel pa tha dad par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: tshig phrad dang 'brel pa tha dad par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: the connection with a verbal prefix is different.

original: yang rgyu ci'i phyir 'brel ba can tha dad pas don tha dad par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang rgyu ci'i phyir 'brel ba can tha dad pas don tha dad par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, why is it that when the connection is different, the meaning is different, but not otherwise?

original: gtso bo ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bo ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The principal” is the answer.

original: 'brel pa can gyi don tha dad pa ni gtso bo yin gyi tshig phrad ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi don tha dad pa ni gtso bo yin gyi tshig phrad ni ma yin no //
translated: The difference in the meaning of the connection is the principal, not the verbal prefix.

original: gtso bor gzhung 'dzugs pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bor gzhung 'dzugs pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The principal is the basis of the text” is the answer.

original: tshig phrad nges gzung ston par byed pa yin na de lam sbyar ba la ci ltar nges par rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: tshig phrad nges gzung ston par byed pa yin na de lam sbyar ba la ci ltar nges par rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the verbal prefix is the indicator of the specification, how is it understood in the combination?

original: nges par gzung ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The specification” is the answer.

original: 'o na tshig phrad sbyar ba don med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na tshig phrad sbyar ba don med do zhe na /
translated: But if this is so, then the use of the particle is meaningless.

original: tshig phrad ni zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: tshig phrad ni zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, “The particle is . . .

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽des ni zhes bya ba ste tshig phrad kyis so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / des ni zhes bya ba ste tshig phrad kyis so //
translated: Why?🔽It is because of that, i.e., the particle.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni khyad par la sogs pa'i tshig gis brjod pa'i nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni khyad par la sogs pa'i tshig gis brjod pa'i nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: The word “just” is used to indicate that the meaning is restricted to the words “action,” etc.

original: tshig phrad gsal bar byed pa nyid yin pa ston pa ni /
analyzed: tshig phrad gsal bar byed pa nyid yin pa ston pa ni /
translated: He shows that the particle is used to clarify:

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Thus, . . .

original: tshig phrad med kyang snyim pa la sogs pa'i byed pa rnam par gcad nas bum pa nyid byed par rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: tshig phrad med kyang snyim pa la sogs pa'i byed pa rnam par gcad nas bum pa nyid byed par rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Even without the particle, the meaning of the word “pot” is understood as the action that excludes the action of cupping the hands, etc.

original: de lta ma yin na byed pa'i khyad par smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na byed pa'i khyad par smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the mention of the particular action would be meaningless.

original: de dag kyang zhes bya ba ni byed pa la sogs pa'i tshig dag go //
analyzed: de dag kyang zhes bya ba ni byed pa la sogs pa'i tshig dag go //
translated: “Those” refers to the words “action,” etc.

original: tshig phrad rjod byed yin par smra bas smras pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshig phrad rjod byed yin par smra bas smras pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent who maintains that the particle is used to express the meaning of the word says, “If . . .

original: de dag ces bya ba ni las la sogs pa'i tshig rnams tha dad pas /
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni las la sogs pa'i tshig rnams tha dad pas /
translated: “Those” refers to the words “action,” etc., which are different.

original: nges par gzung ba'i rang bzhin gyi don tha dad pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i rang bzhin gyi don tha dad pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: the meaning of the definite description would be different.

original: thal ba las ldog pa brjod pa ni nges par gzung ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thal ba las ldog pa brjod pa ni nges par gzung ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reversal of the reductio is stated: “The definite description is . . .”

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa des na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa des na /
translated: Since that is so,🔽the meaning of the words “action” and so on is not to be taken as different from the words “pervasion” and “exclusion” because of the ascription of the words “action” and so on to the pervasion and the exclusion.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ste las la sogs pa'i tshig dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid dang / nges par gzung bas ldog pa ste tha dad pa dag las la sogs pa'i tshig gi don tha dad par brtags pas nad la sogs pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya ba ni tshig phrad kyi brjod bya nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ste las la sogs pa'i tshig dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid dang / nges par gzung bas ldog pa ste tha dad pa dag las la sogs pa'i tshig gi don tha dad par brtags pas nad la sogs pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya ba ni tshig phrad kyi brjod bya nyid do zhe na /
translated: The words “action” and so on are to be taken as the object of expression of the compound.

original: gsal bar byed pas ma yin te zhes smras so //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pas ma yin te zhes smras so //
translated: The answer is “not by the explicit statement.”

original: de ma sbyar na zhes bya ba ni bum pas chu 'on cig ces bya ba la sogs par kho na'i tshig sbyar ba nyid yin na nges par gzung bar yang rtogs so //
analyzed: de ma sbyar na zhes bya ba ni bum pas chu 'on cig ces bya ba la sogs par kho na'i tshig sbyar ba nyid yin na nges par gzung bar yang rtogs so //
translated: The phrase “if it is not connected” means that if the word “only” is not connected to the words “action” and so on, then the definite description is understood.

original: de med par rtogs kyang de'i don ci ste ma yin snyam na smras pa nges par gzung ba'i rang bzhin gyi don gang zhig kho na'i sgra gang med kyang rtogs pa'i nges par gzung ba de ci ltar kho bo'i tshig don yin te brjod par bya ba yin
analyzed: de med par rtogs kyang de'i don ci ste ma yin snyam na smras pa nges par gzung ba'i rang bzhin gyi don gang zhig kho na'i sgra gang med kyang rtogs pa'i nges par gzung ba de ci ltar kho bo'i tshig don yin te brjod par bya ba yin
translated: If you think that even though you understand that, why is its meaning not that, then I say: What is the meaning of the nature of the definite exclusion that is understood even when the word only is not stated? How can that definite exclusion be the meaning of my words?

original: / 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba gal te kho na'i tshig med kyang bum pa la sogs pa sgra kho na las nges par gzung ba rtogs pa yin na de'i tshe @155b las dang byed pa la sogs pa tha dad par rjod par byed pa dag las ci
analyzed: / 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba gal te kho na'i tshig med kyang bum pa la sogs pa sgra kho na las nges par gzung ba rtogs pa yin na de'i tshe @155b las dang byed pa la sogs pa tha dad par rjod par byed pa dag las ci
translated: If a pot and so on is ascertained from the word only even without the word only, then at that time what is the point of expressing the difference between action and agent and so on?

original: ltar rnam par gcod pa tsam tha mi dad par rtogs pa /
analyzed: ltar rnam par gcod pa tsam tha mi dad par rtogs pa /
translated: How is mere exclusion understood without difference?

original: don tha dad par brjod pa rnams kyi brjod par bya ba ni tha mi dad par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: don tha dad par brjod pa rnams kyi brjod par bya ba ni tha mi dad par mi 'thad do //
translated: It is not tenable that the referent of expressions that express different meanings is not different.

original: 'di ni khas blangs nas brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni khas blangs nas brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is stated having accepted that.

original: 'di ni 'thad pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ni 'thad pa yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: This is also untenable, I say.

original: rnam par gcod pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated in the line “Exclusion is . . . ”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de'i zhes smos so //🔽rnam par gcod pa nyid ston par byed pas /
analyzed: de'i zhes smos so // rnam par gcod pa nyid ston par byed pas /
translated: Because it is said, “that” .

original: ngag gang la 'bras bu yod pa de ni de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ngag gang la 'bras bu yod pa de ni de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: It is called “that” because it is the result of the speech that is the means of verbal other-exclusion.

original: gzhan rtogs pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar ba 'dis ni gdon mi za bar ma 'brel pa la sogs pa 'ba' zhig rnam par gcad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan rtogs pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar ba 'dis ni gdon mi za bar ma 'brel pa la sogs pa 'ba' zhig rnam par gcad par bya ba yin te /
translated: The application of this other-exclusion is to exclude only the non-connection, etc.

original: de lta ma yin na smra ba pos de brjod pa 'bras bu med la rtogs pa pos kyang mi rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na smra ba pos de brjod pa 'bras bu med la rtogs pa pos kyang mi rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the speaker’s expression of that would be fruitless, and the hearer would not understand it at all.

original: ci ltar 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba yod dam snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba yod dam snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “How is it that there is seeing in some cases?”

original: mthong ngo zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: mthong ngo zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement, “It is seen”

original: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is like the example .

original: rab tu grags pa'i ngag gi rang bzhin brjod pa ni phan tshun zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rab tu grags pa'i ngag gi rang bzhin brjod pa ni phan tshun zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The statement, “The nature of the well-known speech” is “mutually.”

original: tshig gi tshogs nyid dag yin gyi /
analyzed: tshig gi tshogs nyid dag yin gyi /
translated: They are collections of words.

original: gdangs zhes bya ba tha dad pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gdangs zhes bya ba tha dad pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no separate thing called “sound.”

original: 'dir ni 'di 'dra ba tshig gi tshogs dag tu mi gzung gi 'on kyang tshig tshegs pa'i rang bzhin ngag gis rdzogs par byed pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshig la ngag ces brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di 'dra ba tshig gi tshogs dag tu mi gzung gi 'on kyang tshig tshegs pa'i rang bzhin ngag gis rdzogs par byed pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshig la ngag ces brjod pa yin te /
translated: Here, such a collection of words is not held to be speech. Rather, speech is said to be the words that complete the nature of a word through voice.

original: 'dir ni srid sgrub la sogs pa'i tshig nyid rnam par gcod byed du 'dod kyi tshig gi tshogs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni srid sgrub la sogs pa'i tshig nyid rnam par gcod byed du 'dod kyi tshig gi tshogs ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the words “Arjuna” and so on are asserted to be the words that express, but not the collection of words.

original: de dag nyid ces bya ba ni tshig rnams nyid do //
analyzed: de dag nyid ces bya ba ni tshig rnams nyid do //
translated: “Those very words” means the words themselves.

original: gal te tshig tshogs pa'i rang bzhin nam tshig gi rang bzhin las tha dad pa gdangs zhes bya ba ngag tu ci ste mi bzung zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tshig tshogs pa'i rang bzhin nam tshig gi rang bzhin las tha dad pa gdangs zhes bya ba ngag tu ci ste mi bzung zhe na /
translated: If the nature of a collection of words or the nature of a word is not held to be speech, why is a different entity called “tone” not held to be speech?

original: de las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “From that” means

original: de dag las gzhan gdangs zhes bya ba'i dag kyang med pa'i phyir 'dir tshig nyid ngag gi sgras smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag las gzhan gdangs zhes bya ba'i dag kyang med pa'i phyir 'dir tshig nyid ngag gi sgras smos pa yin no //
translated: because there is nothing called “tone” that is different from those words, here the words themselves are referred to by the term “speech.”

original: gal te ngag gis 'bras bu rnam par gcod pa yin na de'i tshe bstan par bya bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te ngag gis 'bras bu rnam par gcod pa yin na de'i tshe bstan par bya bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If speech is that which expresses, then it would not be the object of expression.

original: bstan par bya ba ni 'bras bu las gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs na ngag gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba ni 'bras bu las gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs na ngag gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you suspect that the object of expression is different from the effect, then there is the statement, “of which speech.”

original: de nyid ni 'bras bu nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'bras bu nyid do //
translated: That very thing is the effect.

original: gal te rnam par gcod pa ston pa yin no don ma bstan pa'i phyir ci ltar don bya ba don du gnyer ba rnams sgra las 'jug snyam na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par gcod pa ston pa yin no don ma bstan pa'i phyir ci ltar don bya ba don du gnyer ba rnams sgra las 'jug snyam na /
translated: If it is the exclusion that is taught, since the object is not taught, how do those who seek the object engage in the object’s function?

original: smras pa don ni rnam par gcod pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: smras pa don ni rnam par gcod pa de nyid yin no //
translated: It is said that the object is that very exclusion.

original: gal te rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pa ma yin nam des na ci ltar de don yin snyam na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pa ma yin nam des na ci ltar de don yin snyam na /
translated: If exclusion is not a non-thing, then how is it the object?

original: rnam par gcod pa yang zhes smos so //🔽rnam par gcad pa ni rigs mi mthun pa @156a * //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa yang zhes smos so // rnam par gcad pa ni rigs mi mthun pa @156a * //
translated: The statement “exclusion too” is made.

original: las log pa'o //
analyzed: las log pa'o //
translated: Exclusion is the opposite of what is not of the same type.

original: 'o na rnam par gcod pa rtogs pas ma yin no snyam na /🔽des na zhes smos te rnam par gcod pa gzhan ma yin pas na'o //
analyzed: 'o na rnam par gcod pa rtogs pas ma yin no snyam na / des na zhes smos te rnam par gcod pa gzhan ma yin pas na'o //
translated: If you think that exclusion is not understood,🔽then the statement “by that” is made, because it is not a different exclusion.

original: de dang zhes bya ba rnam par gcad bzhin pa dang / tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba rnam par gcad bzhin pa dang / tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “That” refers to the exclusion that is not different from what is being excluded.

original: rnam par gcod pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam par gcad bzhin pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam par gcad bzhin pa nyid do //
translated: The term “exclusion” means that which is being excluded.

original: dngos po yin la zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: dngos po yin la zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: “ Entity” is a general term.

original: rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dngos po med pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba sgras 'phen pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dngos po med pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba sgras 'phen pa yin no //
translated: Exclusion is the object of a valid cognition that is the nature of a nonentity, and it is what is conveyed by a word.

original: rigs mi mthun pa rnam par gcad pa dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rigs la sogs pa ston par byed pa'i sgras 'phen pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa rnam par gcad pa dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rigs la sogs pa ston par byed pa'i sgras 'phen pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That which is the object of a valid cognition that is a nonentity, the exclusion of a dissimilar type, is what is conveyed by a word that indicates a type and so on. This is the meaning.

original: de ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: That is exclusion.

original: gzhan rigs brjod pas so //
analyzed: gzhan rigs brjod pas so //
translated: Another is indicated by the expression of a type.

original: gzhan ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Another is a nonentity.

original: gal te 'di dngos po dang 'brel pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di dngos po dang 'brel pa yin na /
translated: If it is related to an entity,

original: de lta na ni rigs la sogs pa'i dngos po bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni rigs la sogs pa'i dngos po bstan pa ni /
translated: then the indication of an entity, such as a type,

original: dngos po med pa 'phen par 'gyur ba zhig na de ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa 'phen par 'gyur ba zhig na de ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: would convey a nonentity, but that is not the case.

original: 'brel pa med kyang 'phen na ni thams cad thams cad kyis 'phen par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni 'brel pa med kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa med kyang 'phen na ni thams cad thams cad kyis 'phen par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni 'brel pa med kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that it is projected even though there is no relation, then everything would project everything.

original: 'o na ci ltar 'phen snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar 'phen snyam na /
translated: If you ask, “How is it projected?”

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: [The root text] states, “If it is said that . . .”

original: ldog pa ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: “Exclusion” is the elimination of something.

original: ldog pa dang ldan pa las zhes bya ba ldog pa can rnam par bcad bzhin pa las tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa dang ldan pa las zhes bya ba ldog pa can rnam par bcad bzhin pa las tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: “From that which possesses exclusion” means that that which possesses exclusion is not different from the eliminated.

original: tha mi dad pa yin na'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yin na'o //
translated: It is not different.

original: 'dis ni de'i bdag nyid yin na 'phen par rigs pa yin na khyed kyis ni de'i bdag nyid du yang khas ma blangs so zhes bstan pa yin no //🔽de'i bdag nyid med kyang 'brel pa'i phyir 'phen pa yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: 'dis ni de'i bdag nyid yin na 'phen par rigs pa yin na khyed kyis ni de'i bdag nyid du yang khas ma blangs so zhes bstan pa yin no // de'i bdag nyid med kyang 'brel pa'i phyir 'phen pa yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: This shows that if it were of the same nature as that, it would be suitable to be projected, but you do not accept that it is of the same nature as that.

original: tha dad kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Anticipating the qualm, “It is projected because of the relation, even though it is not of the same nature as that,” [the root text] states, “Even though they are different . . .”

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang /
translated: Even though things and nonthings are not of the same nature as that,

original: khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa las 'phen pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa las 'phen pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is projected by the relation of the characteristic and the characterized.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mthar ni don 'di yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mthar ni don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of the conclusion beginning with “No” is as follows.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa de dag de'i bdag nyid ma yin na bum pa med pa shing gi rang bzhin ma yin pas na /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa de dag de'i bdag nyid ma yin na bum pa med pa shing gi rang bzhin ma yin pas na /
translated: If those entities and non-entities are not of the same nature, then the non-existence of a pot is not the nature of a tree.

original: bum pa dngos po gzhan shing las ldog pa med par te /
analyzed: bum pa dngos po gzhan shing las ldog pa med par te /
translated: Therefore, the pot, which is a different entity, is not distinguished from the tree.

original: tha mi dad par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be understood as not different.

original: gang zhig bum pa med pa las ldog pa de ni bum pa nyid yin te dper na mngon par 'dod pa'i bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gang zhig bum pa med pa las ldog pa de ni bum pa nyid yin te dper na mngon par 'dod pa'i bum pa bzhin no //
translated: Whatever is distinguished from the non-existence of a pot is itself a pot, like the pot that is actually desired.

original: khyod kyis 'dod pas shing yang bum pa med pa las ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: khyod kyis 'dod pas shing yang bum pa med pa las ldog pa yin no //
translated: Since you accept that, the tree is also distinguished from the non-existence of a pot.

original: @156b de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang shing de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis ldog pa ste dngos po med pa rtogs par khas len pa yin na yang /
analyzed: @156b de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang shing de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis ldog pa ste dngos po med pa rtogs par khas len pa yin na yang /
translated: “Therefore” means that because of being the nature of the pot and the tree, the other valid cognition of nonexistence is excluded, and one accepts the realization of nonexistence.

original: ldog pa de dang gcig tu 'gyur pa de nyid gnyis 'brel pa med pa nyid du rtogs pa ste nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldog pa de dang gcig tu 'gyur pa de nyid gnyis 'brel pa med pa nyid du rtogs pa ste nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: However, that exclusion would be the same as that, and one would realize, that is, ascertain, that the two are unrelated.

original: gang las snyam na ldog pa med pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang las snyam na ldog pa med pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From what? From “the exclusion of nonexistence.”

original: dngos po phan tshun tha dad pa med pa rnams ni tha dad pa dang 'brel par rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po phan tshun tha dad pa med pa rnams ni tha dad pa dang 'brel par rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Things that are not mutually different cannot be realized to be related to difference.

original: des na gal te bum pa dang shing gcig tu gyur na /
analyzed: des na gal te bum pa dang shing gcig tu gyur na /
translated: Therefore, if the pot and the tree were the same,

original: de'i tshe de dag dngos po med pa dang 'brel par rtogs mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i tshe de dag dngos po med pa dang 'brel par rtogs mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: then one would not be able to realize that they are related to nonexistence. This is the meaning.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of “But if . . .” and so on is as follows.

original: gal te yang dngos po med pa las dngos po tha dad pas na bum pa dang shing dag de'i bdag nyid yin pa de lta na yang dngos po med pas tha dad pa dang dngos po tshogs pa yang gcig la rag las pa'i 'brel pa yod pa nyid
analyzed: gal te yang dngos po med pa las dngos po tha dad pas na bum pa dang shing dag de'i bdag nyid yin pa de lta na yang dngos po med pas tha dad pa dang dngos po tshogs pa yang gcig la rag las pa'i 'brel pa yod pa nyid
translated: If, on the other hand, you think that since a thing is different from a non-thing, a pot and a tree are of the same nature, then a thing and a non-thing would be related in the sense that a thing is dependent on a collection of non-things.

original: do // des na tha dad pa 'brel pa rtogs par mi nus so zhes ci ltar brjod snyam pa'o //
analyzed: do // des na tha dad pa 'brel pa rtogs par mi nus so zhes ci ltar brjod snyam pa'o //
translated: So how can you say that a thing and a non-thing are not related?

original: tha mi dad kyang zhes bya ba ni shing dang bum pa tha mi dad kyang /
analyzed: tha mi dad kyang zhes bya ba ni shing dang bum pa tha mi dad kyang /
translated: Even if they are not different, a tree and a pot are not related.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a thing and a non-thing are not related in the sense that a thing is dependent on a collection of non-things.

original: ldog pa dang zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa dang ngo //
analyzed: ldog pa dang zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa dang ngo //
translated: The reversal is a non-thing.

original: lan ni de ni mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de ni mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is: That is not tenable.

original: dngos po las dngos po med pa tha dad par khas len na /
analyzed: dngos po las dngos po med pa tha dad par khas len na /
translated: If you accept that a non-thing is different from a thing,

original: dngos po med pa 'di dngos po de'i 'brel zla ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa 'di dngos po de'i 'brel zla ma yin no //
translated: then this non-thing is not related to that thing.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bum pa'i don ni rang nyid de rang gi ngo bos rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir te shing las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa'i don ni rang nyid de rang gi ngo bos rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir te shing las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of “pot” is itself, because it is the referent of the term “pot,” and because it is not different from the tree.

original: dngos po med pa tha dad pa yin yang dngos po gnyis tha dad par ci ste ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa tha dad pa yin yang dngos po gnyis tha dad par ci ste ma yin snyam na /
translated: But even though nonentity is different, why isn’t the entity different?

original: dngos po las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa yod kyang des ni /
analyzed: dngos po las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa yod kyang des ni /
translated: Even though nonentity exists as different from entity,

original: shing las tha mi dad pa'i bum pa'i tha dad par ni 'gyur bar mi 'os so //
analyzed: shing las tha mi dad pa'i bum pa'i tha dad par ni 'gyur bar mi 'os so //
translated: it is not suitable to be the difference of the pot, which is not different from the tree.

original: gal te dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis tshogs pa gcig la rag las bas 'brel pa'i phyir dngos po dngos po gzhan las dngos po med pas 'byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis tshogs pa gcig la rag las bas 'brel pa'i phyir dngos po dngos po gzhan las dngos po med pas 'byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if the two, entity and nonentity, are related because they depend on a single basis, then the entity will be distinguished from the other entity by the nonentity.

original: rva 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rva 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the horn of the pot.

original: dus mnyam du bum pa'i rva dag ni tshogs pa gcig la dag las kyang khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: dus mnyam du bum pa'i rva dag ni tshogs pa gcig la dag las kyang khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
translated: The horn of the pot and the pot are not related as differentiator and the differentiated, because they are simultaneous.

original: de bzhin du dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag kyang de lta ma yin na yang der mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag kyang de lta ma yin na yang der mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, even if entities and non-entities are not so, they would not be so.

original: rva gnyi ga yang ngo //
analyzed: rva gnyi ga yang ngo //
translated: Both horns.

original: rnam par chad par ni mi 'brel par ro //
analyzed: rnam par chad par ni mi 'brel par ro //
translated: They are not connected as being separate.

original: rva 'di ni rva 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /🔽'o na phan tshun phan 'dogs pas khyad par dang / @157a * //
analyzed: rva 'di ni rva 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni ma yin te / 'o na phan tshun phan 'dogs pas khyad par dang / @157a * //
translated: This horn is that horn is not so.

original: khyad par can gyi ngo bo yin no zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi ngo bo yin no zhe na /
translated: But, it is said, they are the nature of the qualified and the qualifier because they mutually assist.

original: phan tshun zhes bya ba ste phan 'dogs par byed pa ni rgyu nyid kyis sngar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun zhes bya ba ste phan 'dogs par byed pa ni rgyu nyid kyis sngar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Mutually means that which assists. That which assists is a cause because it is prior.

original: 'o na gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po de'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes dogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'o na gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po de'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes dogs pa ni /
translated: But, it is suspected, the basis and the based are the reason for that.

original: gzhi dngos po med pa dang gzhi can dngos po ste /
analyzed: gzhi dngos po med pa dang gzhi can dngos po ste /
translated: The based is a non-entity and the basis is an entity.

original: dngos po ni rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po med pa la gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po ni rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po med pa la gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that an entity is based on a homogeneous and heterogeneous non-entity.

original: gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
translated: The basis and the based are not a real entity.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bla 'og tu zhes bya ba ste dngos po med pa 'og tu gnas pa'i steng na dngos po 'dug par rtogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: bla 'og tu zhes bya ba ste dngos po med pa 'og tu gnas pa'i steng na dngos po 'dug par rtogs pa ni med do //
translated: “Above and below” means that it is not the case that a thing is perceived to be located above a non-thing that is located below.

original: ldog pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dogs pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dogs pa'o //
translated: “The reversal” and so on is the objection.

original: lan ni gal te de lta na gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po yin na de'i tshe 'brel par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //🔽ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: lan ni gal te de lta na gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po yin na de'i tshe 'brel par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro // ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: The response: If that is so, then the relation of the basis and the based is not perceived.🔽Why is that?

original: gang zhig ces gsungs so //
analyzed: gang zhig ces gsungs so //
translated: He says, “because of the non-existence of the basis.”

original: 'di nyid khyad par du rtogs pa ni bum pa'i nang na gnas pa'i snang ba'am /🔽mun pa la bum pa'i zhes brjod pa'am /
analyzed: 'di nyid khyad par du rtogs pa ni bum pa'i nang na gnas pa'i snang ba'am / mun pa la bum pa'i zhes brjod pa'am /
translated: The specific understanding of this is that the light that is located inside a pot is not called the light of the pot,🔽or the darkness that is located inside a pot is not called the darkness of the pot,

original: snam bu'i dbus na gnas pa'i bum pa la snam bu'i zhes brjod pa ni med do //
analyzed: snam bu'i dbus na gnas pa'i bum pa la snam bu'i zhes brjod pa ni med do //
translated: or the pot that is located in the middle of a cloth is not called the pot of the cloth.

original: dngos po med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: “The non-existence of the basis” and so on is the objection.

original: bum pa dang snam bu dag gi dbus su gnas pa ni gdon mi za bar dngos po med pa'i dbus su gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bum pa dang snam bu dag gi dbus su gnas pa ni gdon mi za bar dngos po med pa'i dbus su gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The pot and the cloth that are located in the middle of the pot and the cloth must be located in the middle of the non-existence of the pot and the cloth.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dngos po med pa med na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa med na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If non-entity does not exist,

original: gang gi phyir dngos po dag ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po dag ni /
translated: because entities

original: dbus su gnas pa ni dngos po med pa yod pa kho nas 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: dbus su gnas pa ni dngos po med pa yod pa kho nas 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: do not exist, non-entity would not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de zhes bya ba bum pa la sogs pa khyab pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba bum pa la sogs pa khyab pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that the non-entity would pervade the entity, the pot, etc.

original: bum pa la sogs pas snam bu la sogs pa khyab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pas snam bu la sogs pa khyab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the pot, etc. would pervade the cloth, etc.

original: des na dngos po las tha dad pa'i dngos po med pa ni yod pa kho na yin la ;
analyzed: des na dngos po las tha dad pa'i dngos po med pa ni yod pa kho na yin la ;
translated: Therefore, non-entity, which is different from entity, does exist.

original: de yang dngos po bstan pa'i sgo nas sgras 'phen pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang dngos po bstan pa'i sgo nas sgras 'phen pa yin no //
translated: And that is implied by the word “entity” itself.

original: des na dngos po med pa ni dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid yin no zhes gang brjod pa dang / dngos po nges pa nyid dngos po med pa'i nges pa yin no zhes brjod pa de yang bsal ba yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: des na dngos po med pa ni dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid yin no zhes gang brjod pa dang / dngos po nges pa nyid dngos po med pa'i nges pa yin no zhes brjod pa de yang bsal ba yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the statement that non-entity is the very nature of entity and the statement that the ascertainment of entity is the ascertainment of non-entity are also refuted.

original: lan ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is “Well then . . . ”

original: gal te dngos pa 'ga' zhig dngos po gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa de /🔽de'i bar na gnas pa'i dngos po med pa med par mi 'thad na /
analyzed: gal te dngos pa 'ga' zhig dngos po gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa de / de'i bar na gnas pa'i dngos po med pa med par mi 'thad na /
translated: If some entity were to be included in the middle of two entities,🔽then it would not be tenable that the middle of that entity is not an entity.

original: des na dngos po med pa'i dbus su yang dngos po gnas pa yin na /
analyzed: des na dngos po med pa'i dbus su yang dngos po gnas pa yin na /
translated: If an entity were to exist in the middle of a nonentity,

original: de lta na 'o na dngos po'i dbus 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na dngos po'i dbus 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: then not only would it exist in the middle of an entity,

original: dngos po med pa gzhan med na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa gzhan med na /
translated: but also if another nonentity does not exist,

original: dngos po med pa'i dbus su @157b yang gnas par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i dbus su @157b yang gnas par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: it would not exist in the middle of a nonentity.

original: dngos po med pa gzhan la ltos pa kho nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa gzhan la ltos pa kho nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would exist in the middle of a nonentity only in reliance on another nonentity.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khyab par thal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par thal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it would absurdly follow that it would pervade.
